channel.title: Development on codehakase's logs
channel.description: Recent content in Development on codehakase's logs

item.title: Line Numbers In Vim
item.description: Vim doesn’t show line numbers by default, they can be turned on in your vim configuration. Vim has an absolute, relative and hybrid line numbering mode.

item.title: What I Use
item.description: For the few times I have to tell people in detail the software and hardware I use on a day to day basis to do my job, here’s a post to list them. My setup changes from time to time but I’ll try to keep this up to date. My dotfiles can be found on This Repo - they work for me, read carefully before installing for yourself.
